name: Big Tree Lodge Methven
description:
Big Tree Lodge combines colonial charm with the comforts of home. Our large colonial villa (formerly known as Redwood Lodge) and one time vicarage still features timber panelling, furniture, new timber ceilings and double glazed windows. It offers free unlimited Wi-Fi, tea and coffee, towels, laundry facility, modern and spacious bathrooms with separate toilets and a comfy community living room including a log burner, large LCD TV with PS3, and DVDs. Books, jigsaws, boards games can be found in the hallway . Our large, fully-equipped kitchen, with 2 cookers, is directly connected to the living area. 

There are six lockable bedrooms in the lodge: 2 twins, double, 4-bed and 5-bed shares, plus a double with single bunk room for our family guests. Beds have warm duvets, mink blankets and electric blankets in private rooms, clean and heated. Linen and towels supplied. If you're too tired to relax by the cosy log burner after a hard day on the slopes our private rooms have LCD TV's with built in DVD players for your relaxation.

We have a free lockup for your snow gear and a snowboard/ski tuning area for your use.

We offer free private off-street parking. There is mountain transport, door-to-door, and airport transfer available from local transport providers, booking a must. Plus, we're only four minutes walk from town centre!

groupInformation.cancellationTerms:
Due to our small size and the seasonal nature of our accommodation cancellations affect us significantly. Confirming reservations: acceptance of a reservation requires provision of a valid credit card number, cardholder name and card expiry date and will incur a non refundable booking fee of one nights accommodation taken on confirmation of booking.
Cancellation: Once booked and confirmed by us the following will apply; the initial fee is not refundable and a full tariff charge will be 
made for cancellations within 30 days of the booked date.
groupInformation.additionalTerms: No alcohol to be consumed in the bedrooms.
